pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with the Prime Minister of Israel, Benjamin Netanyahu | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke yesterday with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, who called to offer his congratulations to the Prime Minister on his re-election.

The two leaders reaffirmed their commitment to the strong cooperation between Canada and Israel founded on close people-to-people and historic ties. Prime Minister Trudeau and Prime Minister Netanyahu looked forward to the continued collaboration between Canada and Israel on shared priorities.
